actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
MOTION TO DISCHARGE COMMITTEE - Mr. George Miller of California moved that the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure be discharged from further consideration of H.J. Res. 69.
MOTION TO TABLE MOTION TO DISCHARGE - Mr. Kildee moved to lay the motion to discharge H.J. Res. 69 on the table. Agreed to without objection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

official_title: Relating to a national emergency declared by the President on September 8, 2005.

summary.text: Declares that the national emergency declared by the finding of the President on September 8, 2005, in Proclamation 7924 is hereby terminated.

titles.title: Relating to a national emergency declared by the President on September 8, 2005.
